Review Name: Delightful Review Description: Good ac, Flipkart given right deal.. Installation service proper and responsive. I wanna go with 5 Star AC of same, but not available on flipkart and not deliverable to my pin code, So I settle on this. I heard lot about the LG AC brand, As most reliable and durable product. Further I have not thinking about any other brands. Cooling is fast and soothing. Noice level is very less.
